A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie\, loved almost everything about it\, I thought one of the movie arcs\, was kinda boring\, but that was not enough to take the smile out of my face the entire movie. Other great thing of that movie it is his beautiful scenes. All the actors did a great job on the characters\, really sad about Carrie Fisher not being around us anymore... Probably you already watched it\, but if not\, I recommend you to watch it\, not going to disappoint you. In my personal opinion\, The Last Jedi is the best Star Wars Movie to date\, followed by Return Of The Jedi\, Empire Strikes Back and The Revenge Of The Sith. I hope Solo is even better.
